If someone who has problems with this release gets another one working please report back here. I'm pretty interested to find out why this one doesn't work for some people.

Also, here is a guide for how I burn my games. This may make the difference: 

1. Download DVD Decrypter

2. Run DVD Decrypter and open up your IMAGE.DVD file in Notepad so you get the layer break number.

3. In DVD Decrypter, using the menu list at the top, go to Tools then select Settings

4. Go to the ISO Write Mode tab. On the right hand side you will see a section called Options. In there is a Layer Break category with two radio buttons. Select the second radio button, User Specified. Now, in the Sectors in L0 textbox enter the value that is located in the IMAGE.DVD file after the "LayerBreak=" text. Hit OK. [Because all 360 games need the layer break at the same location, you should only have to set this option once!]

5. Load the .iso file, burn at a low speed such as 2x or 4x using a good DvD+R DL such as Verbatim brand.

6. Install to you're xbox's hard drive and play.
